name: Inflation Tag
description: Hello, MadLad224 here with another game. In this one you play a game of tag, but the one who is chasing is also audibly inflating! After tagging the other person, you're immiedatly deflated and they're inflated to the same point of inflation at which you were and vice versa. Also, after someone is tagged, they can't move for a second to avoid instant retagging. Have fun!
